transcript.title: PM 109/1966 - Welsh Landslide Disaster - Message of Sympathy
transcript.content:
P. M. No. 109/ 1966

Mr. Holt has sent the following message to the BritishÂ Prime Minister, Mr. Harold Wilson, from his aircraft en route to theÂ Manila talks

"I HAVE BEEN DEEPLY DISTRESSED AT THE SADÂ AND GRAVE NEWS OF THE TRAGEDY AT ABERFAN. MYÂ COLLEAGUES AND I AND ALL AUSTRALIANS FEEL SINCERELYÂ FOR THE BEREAVED AND OUR HEARTFELT SYMPATHY IS WITHÂ THEM, WITH YOU AS PRIME MINISTER, AND WITH ALL THEÂ BRITISH NATION AT THIS TIME"

CANBERRA,
23rd October, 1966.
